title: Substation Entity Schema
description: Substation entity definition - extracted from game-state.json for context window optimization. See schemas/formats.json for format specifications.

id.description: Unique substation identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '4-3' for substation type 4, index 3). Type 4 = Substation.

ownerId.description: Player who owns this substation. Format: 'type-index' (e.g., '1-11' for player type 1, index 11). Type 1 = Player.

structs:verification.note: API response schema. Missing field from database (creator) - may be in gridAttributes or separate queries. For code-based field definitions, see schemas/entities.json#/definitions/Substation
